title: Unknown (to me) font
content:
Hi there,  
I found you after a day spent looking for this font.  
I'm trying to create a logo for my website and I saw a picture with a font that I would use as the name of my site is short "Liosite."

Here a preview

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819082046im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2013-07-04_18_3520.png)

I look forward for your help. Thanks so much and sorry for my bad english

lio
author: Lio

comments.content:
Thanks so much!  
Sorry for the delay but I was out of town.
